issue.title: [C++] Zero-copy Buffer constructor from std::string
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1600](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1600). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are instances where we may process an Arrow stream stored in an `std::string`, and there's a bit of typing to construct a `io::BufferReader` from an `std::string`, so we can make this simpler
